name: The Great Central Park Movie Adventure!
description: Do you love movies? Do you love NYC? Do you love movies set in NYC? Then you're gonna love me! My triip is special because you have a movie expert and professional filmmaker taking you on a journey of movies through Central Park. Central Park is the number exterior location used for filmmaking in NYC which means that almost every square inch has been a part of some of your favorite movies. We'll show you some great sites in the park where some of your favorite movies were filmed AND we'll see some of the high end real estate that borders the park that's home to some of your favorite celebs! So come take a triip with me and walk in the footsteps of your favorite characters and celebrities.
